results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: አንተ በጌታህ ጸጋ የተጎናጸፍክ ስትኾን ዕብድ አይደለህም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ጌታህ እርሱ ከመንገዱ የተሳሳተውን ሰው ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡ እርሱም ተመሪዎቹን ዐዋቂ ነው፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
